topic.title: Jewish rabbi from Israel declared in 2016: Jewish solders may rape Non-Jewish woman and this is even recommended. Any Gentile saying such things would have been prosecuted but Jews may do it.
topic.body:
Jewish rabbi from Israel declared in 2016: Jewish solders may rape Non-Jewish woman and this is even recommended

“to crush your enemies, to see them fall at your feet — to take their horses and goods and hear the lamentation of their women. That is best” – further he quotes from Ghenghis Khan 'even he, who excelled at rape, did not see it as essential to warfare, just a satisfactory outcome'.
http://nationalvanguard.org/2016/02/israeli-army-rabbi-jewish-soldiers-may-rape-non-jewish-women/

The Jewish controlled media let this interview fully without echo. Any Gentile saying such things would have been prosecuted but Jews may do it.
